title: Alex Murdaugh Arrested, Charged Over Insurance Settlements in Housekeeperâ€™s Death
sub_head: Arrest adds to litany of other problems for the disgraced South Carolina lawyer
body:
Disgraced South Carolina lawyer Alex Murdaugh was arrested Thursday on charges related to misappropriating insurance settlement money in the death of his longtime housekeeper.
Mr. Murdaugh, 53 years old, was taken into custody after being released from an Orlando drug rehabilitation facility, according to the South Carolina Law Enforcement Division. He was charged with two felony counts of obtaining property by false pretenses.
